verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kaalamu sameepamu prabhu yesu Vachchun jeetamu pondunu nija Daasudu aananda mondedaru Aananda mondedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bayalu padu prati vaani kriyalu karragaddi Koyya kaalainanu vendi bangaaramu Viluva raallainanu agni ye thelupunu Appude kanugonduvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pande mandu neeku paalunna daa Pondu vaadokkade bahumathini Yodhudavai manchi buddhini kaligina Vaada baarani kireeta mondedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aatmala korakai bhaara munnadaa Phalitha munnadaa nee sevalo prabhuni Raakalo andari yeduta aananda mahima 2 Kireeta mondedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sanghamu nadipe sevakudaa mandanu Nadupumu prema thoda aadarshundavai Mandanu kaachina mahima kireetam Neevu pondedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manchi poratamu poraadumu kaapaadu Konu vishwaasamunu thana pratyakshata Napekshinchumu neethi kireetamu Nee kivva badunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhakhtitho brathuka gorinacho siddapadu Ponda himsalanu anthamu varaku Nammika yunchina jeeva kireetamu Pondeda verugu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daya cheyu shresta deevenalu angeeka Rinchu nee praardhanalu praardhana Yandu melconi yundumu swarna kireetamu Dharimpa jeyunu{/lang-eng}
